Mariela serves homemade traditional breakfast and if you ask, she will prepare delicious dinner. You will be greated with a hot loaf of homemade bread and Bulgarian herbal salt.
We stayed in a room and could use the kitchen (with coffeemachine). It was like renting a little apartment, because there were no other guests to share the kitchen with.
The bathroom is modern and the washing machine 9kg (!) large!
There is safe and dry parking for cars, bikes and motorbikes in the barn.
Mother and daughter speak English, father and granddaughter will warm your hearts with smiles.
We didn’t ask, but we think they would let you pitch your tent in the garden. If you need a place to relax and calm down after stressful travels or take a break, this is the perfect place! 
We payed 16€/person including bread for lunch, water, coffee, tea all day long and huge hot breakfast.

name: Auto Electro Ferdi
description:
Ferdi is a very nice and qualify mechanic. They are electric specialist, but they can fix everything and I'm pretty sure they can find any kind of part you might need. 

I had problems with my electric system of my VW T4 for months, any mechanic could find the exactly problem until I found Ferdi. 

It's not very nice area but space enough to park and stay there also if you need to wait. One of the guys speaks good English (telf. 0883344700).

Also very good price.

name: Belasitsa Hut
description: Parking next to Belasista hut. Very nice and quiet (during the week, maybe it can be crowded on weekends) Big green area with child playground and a fountain. open free wifi. If the restaurant is open you can also use the toilets. 2 lev for a beer ;). nice walks around.

name: PCR - Rockefeller Hospital
description:
Covid test (PCR) for crossing the border. 100 lev. 
results in the same day if you go early in the morning. open from 8h to 18h

name: Shiroka Poliana Lake
description:
Popular free camping sites by the lake. It could get quite crowded on summer weekends. Access to this particular spot by the water through a dirt road, could be challenging for a regular car.
It's a mountain lake, so it gets chilly at night. Plenty of firewood around.

name: Bike Wrecker and Repairs
description: Bulgarian motorbike mechanic who wrecks various bikes for spare parts but can also help with any repairs needed. Contact on +359 89 848 0441 through WhatsApp or directly. Does not speak English.

name: Glamping Alliance
description:
Glamping & Motel Alliance is a new site. Facilities are very clean and modern. There are hot showers and hairdrier. You can book your private toilet or a spot with sunroof. Everything works with a QR-code. You have to do a reservation online in advanced. Check-in after 14:00. Departure until 12:00.
glamping-alliance.com

name: Copyshop office1
description:
You can send all documents to their email and they print it out. Many options.

predpechat.vtarnovo@office1.bg

Parking a bit tricky. English spoken. Entry is at the corner.

name: Lyaskovets Monastery
description:
Very nice place to spend one or more nights. Bulgarian people love this place to make picnic at day (on weekend). Quiet at night.
Free wifi in this area. Beautiful view behind the trees.
A lot of place, good for all véhicles. Very nice place. we'll stay a few days
20mn from Veliko

name: Near River
description:
Beautiful place to stay, near the river and a monastery.
Bulgarian people like this place during the weekend for a picnic, but very quiet at night. Meet other overlanders here.

name: By the Lake
description: Nice and big place. Next to E871 and a lake.

name: Bolata Beach
description:
Go straight ahead on the road till the end near the cliff. You can stop your car and camp on the sand. We stayed 2 nights in a weekend and it was perfect. During the day people come to have fun but at sunset everybody goes away and you have a quiet night. It can happen that some locals party and barbecue at night.
Nice place to stay and enjoy the sea, swimming, fishing or following trails by foot.

name: Black Sea
description:
Nice place on the hill 100 meters from the Highway and 50 meters from the ocean (Black Sea).
5 km from Ahtopol.  Shade and a perfect view of sunrise in the morning.
There are some beaches on both sides of the hill. Stony or sandy. Pit fire place. Please don't litter. Take your garbage back and leave it in the city.

name: Lake Iskar
description:
Large place at the Lake.
Some trees and only a few campers came, even though it was a weekend.
Nice water to swim, paddle or fish.
Pit fire places.

name: Пълнене на туристически газови бутилки
description: Place to fill propane tanks. (we struggled to find anywhere else nearby- went to six gas stations).

name: nice marble fountain with drinking water
description: drinking water in fountain on the side of the road

name: Free city tour
description:
Ask at the info point first. From here the free tour of the city starts 
In front of the building of justices”.

name: Auto air conditioning service
description:
Service for car air conditioners and engine/transmission too. 
Jivko and Plamen are great guys!
+(359)899664048. In Bulgaria, 0899664048
 Bratya Vasilevi northern industrial zone 2, Haskovo
Great service! Good prices, friendly and speaks enough English, German, French!

name: By the rocks
description: A good place top spent the night If you want to go rock climbing. Flat paved aera near by the climbing sectors

name: Sipa
description: Tomb of king  with parking. Not sure if sleeping overnight is allowed. No facilities.

name: Sredska
description: Aside the road but little traffic. Quiet with nice views. The locals(very few) are friendly.

name: Wild camp on the road to Tri Mogili
description: Wild camp with gorgeous views aside the road. There are two water sources nearby. The road to Tri Mogili is unpaved after Belintash but is accessible by any car.

name: water well
description: Not sure if it's ok to drink, but sure is good for washing

name: Riverside
description: Free camping spot by the river, one minute from the main road. Locals camping and fishing, early june, so in full season it might be more busy. Fire pits all around and some trains passing by, 50m away up the hill.

name: Hotel Veronika
description: Nice hotel in Devin. Spacious room with a double bed, 45 leva for one person, 65 leva for two, breakfast is included. Parking is on the street in front, it is a quiet cul de sac across from a fire station. I parked the bike for two nights with no problems. Walking distance to the cafes in the center. A good basecamp to explore the sights around Devin.

name: Lovkovtzi Lake
description:
Beautiful Spot! You can camp right at the lake. There’s plenty of spots . No- one would bother if you set up a tent as well, but it should probably not look like a campground. Just keep it simple. 
The spot was very clean, please keep it like that. If you have to… use a shovel;)
I picked the very little garbage I could find. Maybe you can do it too. 
Do not leave a trace!
Pretty good cell phone service.

name: Shady spot close by the river
description:
Good spot to hide from the sun. There’s some shady trees around and a fire pit. Access to the river too. Not far from the lake as well.

Pretty clean. Please leave it the same! Don’t forget your shovel if you need to…. ;)

name: Church
description: Little church with clean water, electricity and ligth

name: Imperial Oil
description: Refills Gas bottles. Has many adapters. Also a regular gas station.

name: BG Village Camping
description: Small campsite operated by 2 sympathetic English ladies. Small bar splash pool.

name: Sea cliffs
description: Plenty spots at the cliffs.  Access to the water between the rocks when the sea is not to rough.

name: montana
description: open area nearby the lake.

name: frog melody lake
description: Place very close to Prohoda Cave, at the moment (10.08) the lake is dry, but the place is quite nice to stay for a night.

name: source at highway
description: open water source at the highway with parking

name: Old military area (nato)
description: Near Sofia before the Bulgarien-Serbien border, an amazing area for offroad campers.

name: Beach near Burgos
description: It's a nice quiet place at the beach with some locals. Very quiet at night.

name: Cliff with a view
description: Not so easy to get there, when you come from the beach you just go straight, I'm on a bicycle and it was ok but not easy by car I guess, a small 4x4 should be able to make it.

name: At the river
description: A lot of space next to a river  that is knee deep. Some fly fishermen came in the morning. The water looks clean, good for a refreshing bath. Additional places to camp along the river. Quiet

name: Pine Forest
description: About a hundred meters or so from pavement. You take a 'not very promising' dirt road that leads to this pine forest with plenty of flat ground for leveling up your rig. Nice and quiet.

name: Hidden spot next to main road
description: You can hear the passing traffic but otherwise you will be really well hidden behind dense trees and bushes. Plenty of flat ground.

name: Camping Oasis (Къмпинг Оазис)
description: Spacious and new camp site on the base of the Blue Rocks National Park. Great views! The camp site feels like it is part of the park. Lots of different types of places (under the trees, in the open etc.). There is only one building for (very clean) sanitary services, there will be more in the future.

name: near Varovnik
description: potable water source near Varovnik without any garbage around! keep the place clean.

name: Blue Gate Camping Farm
description: A small "nearly" wild campground offering basic amenities. Suitable for tenting, hammock tenting, roof top tenters, caravans, vans, not over 7m. We do not accept unimogs. Hot outdoor shower, composting toilets, washing machine, swimming pool, trampoline.

name: Near Rila monastery
description: A few kilometers away from the main road, and beyond the many picnic spots, you will find a large meadow with a river flowing on the other side of the road. You can park your vehicle next to the road. The road is a bit bumpy but normal cars can pass. There are no facilities but is very quite.

name: Spot near village
description:
It’s a nice spot, almost flat where you can camp. I’m not sure if during summer cows are here.
Quite and clean.
Anyway, best moment to see the area is mid October, wonderful colours!

name: Paradise
description:
If you like the paradise, this is the place for you. I mean, write here what’s do you think about ))
 The road is quite bad!!
Live!!!

name: Free parking
description:
Closest free parking to the city center (20 min walking). Stayed here a couple nights.

Downsides are that the area is quite sketchy (rundown houses, large potholes, strange looks) and that it’s very close to the road (noisy). Good to park during daytime visits.

name: Troyan pass sunset place
description:
Great place to enjoy the sunset and to stay over night with a stunning view. Easy access next to the Troyan pass (just 100 meter away from the street) No worries you will not  be really visible from the street because of enough vegetation. Trucks use the Troyan pass as well so sometimes a bit more noisy. But not to busy especially at night.

Enough space for more than one vehicle but really flat space for just one camping car. The area is like a little turn-around so also easy to leave.

name: Water source close to the boarder
description: Source with water. Looks newly built (2021)

name: Public camping area. Koshnitsa
description: This place is a public camping area (as seen on a board). Flat area next to the river "Arda". Enough space for several vehicles. You will find sitting areas, barbecues and an earth closet (pit toilet). Easy access also with big rigs, just below the street.

name: Danube beach near Widin / Vidin
description: A quiet spot direct at the danube river banks. This place is not even though, but for one night it is ok.

name: East of Borino
description:
Easy to find and beautiful wild camping spot with very nice views all around ! Good flat spot and close to the road, but still very quite and almost invisible. Is steep track down which demands for a 4x4 vehicle.
Access point to the track is at the hairpin of the main road.

name: Shipkovo Pass
description: Near the top of the pass is a very quiet spot, just off the road, where there are picnic tables and parking for 1 or 2 vehicles. The ground is firm and level and the views are fantastic. There are no facilities or water here and the WiFi signal is poor

name: Tap water
description: Tap water on the secondary road parallel to the main road.

name: Nice wild spot near river
description:
Small dirt track leads down from the main road to a large flat area near the river. Lots of trees, the sound of running water, and well hidden from the road. I wouldn't drink the river water, but there is a potable public fountain just up the road in Sirakovo.

There is a little road noise, but not a lot. I camped here for one night and found it really nice.

name: field and birds
description:
nice spot when you arrive from Turkey, quiet, sing of birds, really clean, we saw anybody. 
OK for 2wd.

name: cemetery fontain
description: cemetery fontain with aqua drinking. easy access

name: Lavrov Country Park
description:
This is a large country park that has fallen into disrepair. The entrance is open (no gates or barriers). The roads are mainly granite cobblestone and in very good condition. Lots of open grass areas abound. At the end of the road is a large car park and beyond that a footpath leads to the reservoir, where there are fishermen and people enjoying windsurfing. 

There is a tap near the car park providing drinking water. There are no other facilities. Very good internet signal. 

We spent one night here that was peaceful and quiet, but you could happily spend 2 or 3 days if you were to engage in water sports.

name: happy waterfalls
description: good place for sleep just near the waterfalls. quiet, free parking, 5 LEV/ person for entrance in the park, it's really beautiful!

name: cemetery fontain
description: just in front of the cemetery, aqua drinking.

name: nice spot on the hill
description: Spot is situation on the hill near eagle eye. Acces rather for the car 4x4.

name: Koukery Campsite
description: Very nice camping. Tolilets and showers are very clean and fragrant, with hot water. You can use refrigerator and kitchen. WiFi is available. If reception is closed, call the host - the number is on the fence.

name: Simitli River Side
description:
Place in the middle of the nature next to the river and a motorcycle track. There are no services. Please leave that place clean. The owner of this land plans in about two years a campground here. We met him and his lovely family. 
With a usual motorhome it’s not possible to reach yet, cause of the way and also not with a truck cause of the low bridge.

name: Mineral bath Simitli
description:
Here you can have a private bath or you can share a pool with others. It is absolutely clean and recommendable. Stuff is not speaking other languages only Bulgarian, but the nice woman called another one who spoke English.
Per private bath it’s 10 Lew for maximum two adults or three children. They were so kind and offered us to have one bathroom because of the  very young age of our children for 13 Lew.

Outside you can get water.

name: ATM
description: Here you have an ATM 24 hours seven days.

name: Free WiFi
description: Free Wi-Fi in the centre you can use with mobile phone.

name: Reservoir View
description:
This is the best site on the Road 866, from Krichim to Devin, for wild camping: the ground is hard and flat; there is enough space for 6 motor homes; it is well away from the regular rock falls next to the road and the views are incredible. 

There are no facilities here, but the internet is good. There is also very little litter here!!! Enjoy 😊

name: Dream Hills
description: A great place to stay with children. You can hike different trails from here. Town is 10 minutes drive away. No services are offered. It’s on the way to the peak Vihren Hut. In 5 m distance, you can find a Geocache Point.

name: Regnum Banya Thermal
description:
A very nice Thermal bath, not huge, but quite nice. Could be crowded between 3 and 5 p.m. At 4p.m. entrance costs half. They offer 4 different pools with warm water 35 and 45 degrees, a jacuzzi, a baby area with warm water,  and also a steam bath.  It’s absolutely clean with friendly staff. Food tastes good. For us it’s a little bit expensive, but we didn’t want to miss it. We paid 30 Lew each adult; our 4 children were free (usually up to 4 years). After we asked, we were allowed to stay at the parking lot in front of the entrance overnight, which was secured by a camera and security staff.
Two Geocaches are around as well as nice points of interest.
https://regnumbanyathermal.com/

name: Regnum Banya Thermal
description: After we asked (fernwehmitkindern) ,we were allowed to stay at the parking lot in front of the entrance which is secured by cameras and security staff. We also spent a day in the baths. Food, WiFi  (open) and showers.. There are also restaurants and a mini market in the little town. Behind the bath at the Turkish bath is a playground which offers tools for learning physical exercises. It’s part of a geocache. Fresh mineral water is next to the Turkish bath to fill up your bottles.

name: Next to dam
description: Short dirt road off the highway, nice and quiet and away from everything. No services, just wild camping, enough space for regular vehicle.

name: shipka
description: Clear water public fontain. Good pressure, easy to fil tank

name: Plovdiv riversides
description: An absolutely great place to stay for one or more nights. It’s almost quiet as it could be next to a city with trains and a lot of green around, directly located next to the river. The right place for a family like us with four children and a dog to chill after sightseeing in the great city of Plovdiv. Here are no services.

name: Buzludzha Hiking Point
description: Here you can find water from the mountain.

name: Madzharovo
description:
This is a huge, disused, car park suitable for vehicles of any size. The ground is almost totally flat (just enough of a slope to allow water to flow off-site) and big enough to accommodate 20+ motor homes. It is close to the road, but there is very little traffic in the area… apart from cows that roam freely everywhere. 

The Vulture Centre is 10 minutes walk away (next to the big bridge). If you are visiting at the right time of year (May-June) you are bound to see Griffon vultures flying overhead.

name: Camping Alba
description:
MODERATOR NOTE: Description provided by owner or manager. 

A new campsite with a spectacular mountain view. Clean and comfortable sanitary, wide grass pitches, BBQ zones for free use.

name: Obzor Parking
description: Here we spent a night before the season started. During the day, there are some people at the beach and the restaurants are still closed (I think during season it will be crowded). We’ve parked directly next to the restaurant of the Obzor Beach Resort which offer free high speed and stable WiFi. Only few meters to public showers. Supermarkets are in the hotels, too.

name: The Truffle Forest
description: An absolutely amazing place in peace and tranquility. You’ll have a breathtaking view to Varna, but no services. Petkos little farm is only a little walk away. Please keep that great piece of nature clean and take your rubbish away.

name: Between two small streams
description: Secluded camping spot on flat grass between two small steams. Follow a small wheel track from the road until you reach pine trees. No buildings in sight. Quiet apart from the water flowing in the streams. 4G connection.

name: Dirt track
description: Very flat ground with an easy dirt track. Relatively quiet (only a little noise from cars).

name: great grass place
description: a good small road leads to a nice grass place .nothing around view on the mountains.i stayd one night.great

name: Designated camp site
description: Camping in the national park is only allowed at designated campspots. Here it is indicated that you can camp. On other places there are signs it is not allowed, this is the only spot were it is allowed. Very nice place with a running stream. It can be very cold at night. The road to here is quite rough, lots of stones, not suitable for all vehicles. A little further along the road is a waterpoint and at the end of the road is a house where 2 men were present. A saw may come in handy, we had to saw a piece of a fallen tree over the road. No phone signal here.

name: Near church
description:
Church in the forest, not in use but perfect place for camping.
water well on site. very secluded and quiet.

name: Forest clearing
description: Had seen too many spots along the road littered with wet wipes. This location marks where you can exit the road and if you then keep right and drive down (4x4 recommended), you can follow a narrow forest track away from the road. After about 700m you’ll come to a small quiet clearing with a nice view at 41.593, 23.698,

name: Riverside Forest
description: Lots of places to camp in the forest along the river here. Seems to be a popular unofficial camping area for Bulgarians also as there were several other campervans and caravans, but there’s plenty of space to find your own spot.

name: Orjakhovo
description:
Ferry boat at 14.00 to port bechet Romania.
1 person 1 motorbike  : total 3 euro,
one way to Romania port bechet.
As well passport control and registration of motorbike going out of Bulgaria.
There was a long line of heavy trucks, just overtook them, customs just said pass over, next yo do the ticket in the office on the left side (there are signs) and last bulgarian police, everything was fast.
There was a fat guy manageing the parking of my motorbike, he said do not worry there are security cameras upon us and you can sit and relax under the hexagon roof on the right side looking the donau river.....

name: Lake
description: It's an amazing spot, close to a wooden cabin. You can sleep inside but some people come for the place visit and enjoy the little beach. There is lot of place to put a tent, make a fire. You can come with your car too. We drank the lake's water with our filter and there is no problem. It's a very safe place for camp few day's and enjoy sunset.. Sunrise.. Lake.. Nature!

name: Hotel Gotse Delchev
description: Just your standard, basic hotel. There is a pool but it wasn’t open when we were here, or the restaurant, due to renovations. 65LEV for a double occupancy.

name: Some sort of old car park off the highway
description:
Not really sure what this place was ,but several cars came and parked up.I camped in the pine tress. Some other cars came by ,took a break and left.A little bit of noise from the traffic but it wasn't too bad at night as the traffic calms down.No problems.Slept well.
Good for a night.Good views also of the mountains.

name: Roadside
description:
Nothing special...but thankful for it.
It's a stop for the night if it's late or you're tired.
I was!
It was fine for me for one night.
Traffic stopped at night so it was very quiet.

name: Red Rope River
description: Local swimming spot along Vidima River. Most of the good swimming areas are quite busy in the day but it was quiet at night. Lots of places at the top of the bank, trails leading down to the river have tent spots. River is clean and fantastic for swimming. At this location there is a rope swing.

name: Svejen Dam
description:
Really beautiful quiet spot by the reservoir. I chose to camp in the pines. Some locals around camping and fishing, but very few people. You can enter from the other side also .You can walk across the dam too.
There a small store in the village down the road. It shows up on Maps.me if you zoom in. Next to little bridge. Doesn't look like a store but it is.

name: mirkovo
description: Campground behind a restaurant. toilets are available

name: Parking at Monument
description: It is the second parking at the monument. It is quiet and inside a nature forest with walking possibilities. We are here on a saturday night in summer and alone. No cars since 21:00.

name: Lakeside
description: Nice and quiet place on the lake. Mini beach close by. Accessible by dirt road from north side (high clearance recommend but relatively easy ride).

name: Perfect place in the woods
description: We took the exit immediately after the narrow bridge on the main road and followed the dirt road for a while. Then, just follow the ‘road’ on Google Maps satellite images and navigatie through the higher grass. Plenty of spots with and without shade along the river. Been here for two days and saw nobody.

name: Shady River
description: Along this road there are quite a few small roads that lead down to the river, and it is possible for camping. We picked this one because it has shade and short grass that is better for a tent. Lots of space. We saw no other traffic while we were here.

name: Hotel Vega
description: Large rooms with AC and separate lounge area. Comfortable and clean. Walking distance to town centre. L50.

name: Camping Irakli
description: Not to be confused with the wild camp, this is a great little campground that fits all sized vehicles. Tent spaces available, most with trees as shade. clean bathrooms and toilets, small shop onsite selling essential items, food etc. 100m walk to the beach. Recommended.

name: Shipkovo Pass 2
description: Spot off the side of the road with picnic table and fire pit. Forested with lots of shade, no view at this spot. Cell phone service is poor.

name: Hair of the Dog
description: Party hostel if that's your thing. Friendly atmosphere good for a night. Close enough to beach and restaurants etc. Good parking for motorcycles.

name: Free drinkable water
description: Easy to acces on your way to Rila Monastary

name: Uncle Kiro
description: Fresh water with a marvelous view. Fill up your bottle after the hike.

name: By the Chapel
description: Nice spot by the Chapel just outside Marisa. There is tap water, table and squat toilet. The cross is lightened in the evening. The Road os very close and you Can hear the cars.

name: Pirin Water Spring
description: Absolutely lovely year-round spring. Flows well and will fill any size water container in minutes. It tastes FANTASTIC! Pull off is on a slight hill, but you can head up the mountain a few kms to reach a good turnround.

name: Beachside
description: Place for many cars. Flat area near the beach.

name: Water
description: cold fresh water on the way to Shipka Pass

name: Makeya Motors
description:
Motorbike parts and accessories shop. They can order anything for the next day if they don’t have it in stock. 
English spoken. Nice cafe next door.

name: Place right on the beach.
description: Asphalt road along the beach with many places to stay.  Nice and quiet.  Good access.

name: Okolchitsa Peak
description:
Just next to the road there is a big open field with a small shelter. Lots of room a no traffic here at night. It's next to there Връх Околчица monument. Wild horses roam here and lots of hiking places. 
The view is phenomenal!

name: Church of Saint Thomas
description: The road to reach the small church is paved, but full of curves. Not suitable for a big caravan, we put tent, stayed for the night, very quiet, nobody bothered us.

name: Buzludzha
description: Nice place near the monument, safe to use a rooftent, tent or a hammock. It's been used previously because you can find camping fire remains.

name: Mineral Barhs Rupite
description: Perfect for camping large plot, ideal, quiet

name: Camper Stop
description:
Guarded parking lot with a shower, toilet, washing machine (3€) and dryer (3€).
Electricity (5€). Free, super fast WiFi (70mbps).

Additionally they offer SERVICE (not mechanical but all things camper such as bord electricity, solar, new windows etc.) and have a camping shop. You can park your car when flying out as well (5€).

name: Water
description: Fresh water spring, it is on maps.me, could be difficult to find if walking from the nearby campsite

name: By the river near the village
description: Coming from the main road you turn right through a gravel road. After a pond you'll find some good spots for camping next to the river.

name: EXCANGE OFFICE
description: If coming from MKD here you can get rid off you macedonian denar and also change euros to Bulgarian Lev at a nicerate (195 at the moment).

name: albenona exchange
description: Best place i could find in Plovdiv to convert Euros to Lev.

name: Above the lake with great view
description: You can find this nice place 100m next to the road with great view. Totally silent

name: wind mill park
description: very good to drink, fresh water, near the road.

name: Bulgarian road E vignette
description: BGToll, Bulgarian road e-vignette, sales point at LUK oil. Inside there are two vending machines where you can buy your vignette. Payment by card is available. Especially when you have no internet connection it’s an easy way to pay for the vignette.

name: Camperspot Sarafovo port
description:
This is maintained by the Municipality of Burgas. It is 5 minutes walk from the center of the neighborhood and close to  a beach. There is a coastal bike alley that connects the port with the Sea Garden and the center of Burgas.
    The camperstop has one bathroom with sink and toilets. 
    The place has an excellent location, easy access, stunning view and the ability to clean chemical toilets. WiFi is free!

name: Beautifully spot at the Lake
description: Beautiful lake with many places to stay. Some places are reachable with a camper, others are just reachable with a 4x4 or a motorcycle. Super silent just some fishers are around.

name: Cliffside Camp
description: There is a 2km stretch here along the cliffside in the trees that makes some great camping. A lot more quiet than Krapets, at least when we are were here.

name: Akord Hotel
description:
3 star Hotel with safe parking for cars and motorbikes. 36€ on booking for two. Very comfortable.
Barrier of parking opens with ticket, free for Hotel guests.

name: Workshop
description: Very clean and professional parts shop for any véhicle. had a problem with my speedometer câble, they rebuilt a new one. seems liké if they do not have thé part they are able to build everything from cable to mechanical windows lifter or clutch systèm.

name: Paid Parking at the National Stadium
description: 20 LEV (10EU) to park for 24 hours.  No services but rubbish bins and a safe location not far from the city.  Just far enough off the road to be quieter.  Restaurants nearby and a nice park with toilets. 4G cell reception.  There are a few spots where longer rigs can hang over under trees.

name: Hot Spring Water
description:
This place should not be missed!!!
Hot thermal sulfur water spot! Public and free pool for swimming and relaxing in 40-50°C hot sulfur water. Used from a lot of locals....Nice to get in contact too. The pool is directly on the sea, so you can switch the waters also.
Hot showers with the same water available too. 
Open 24/7 all year around! 
Highly recommended

name: Drinking Water
description: Drinking water point in the village. Next to a little church. Parking right in front

name: Pin Auto Ltd.
description: General mechanic with two high lifts. Suitable for vans up to 3meters. The owner is very responsive via viber. Speaks very little English/German but familiar with google translate.

name: CarWash Varna
description:
A Carwash in the north of Varna with paid and guarded parking in the back fee for one night is 10 Lewa
possible to get water for 5 Lewa 
10 minutes to the beach with shops and restaurants 
Good for one night - no camping in tent

name: Rock-Hewn Churches of Ivanovo
description: Nice flat car park beneath the Rock-Hewn Churches of Ivanovo

name: 7 Lakes Camping
description:
ADMIN NOTE:  entered by owner, NOT an independent review. Not open until June 2023

Opening on the 1st June 2023. Camping 7 Lakes is a new year-round campsite at the foot of the beautiful Rila mountain - to be opened in the spring of 2023. Located near the central part of the town of Sapareva Banya and has 60 comfortable pitches for accommodation with your tent, camper or caravan. The campsite will offer numerous amenities tailored to all the modern requirements of visitors. Three outdoor thermal pools at the 7 Lakes campsite await you. Also, countless possibilities for entertainment and activities in and around the campsite are to be explored.

name: Wild camping in nature
description: We arrived at this place by entering a path, we traveled by bicycle and it was easy to get to this point, the place is with nearby but the fence is open and we are behind the trees very quiet and birds singing.

name: wild camping next to river maritza
description: On the main path we walk towards the first path on the right then we walk to the end where we cross some stones and a hole around it then we find the camping site ,quiet and it is flat for the tent, we arrived with our bicycles.

name: playground with fontain
description:
free water 
playground with a water fountain.  you can connect a hose.  slow flow but there is a picnic area to wait.  also garbage cans.

name: laundromat Black Sea
description:
parking lots 
washing 5kg price 5 lev.  
dryer 5 lev.  
free wifi 
you have to bring the laundry

name: Bulgarie to Serbia
description: 30 min with just French ID card. and car administrative paper. just looked inside the camper on Bulgarie side. good feeling with custom people. .

name: Money Exchange
description: Money exchange in the Shell Station (only in direction to Turkiye)

name: Camping Bor
description:
Nice campground 500m behind the monastery. Besides to a small river.
Unfortunately off season closed.
Access to the camping is a bit challenging.
Restaurants are available behind the monastery.

name: Old Copper Mine Lake
description: Beautiful campspots overlooking a blue lake. Depending on the vehicle you can drive further down. With our Pajero 4x4 we reached this beautiful little terrace, after heavy rain the ground is more muddy and maybe not so easily accessible without 4x4… street leading there is fine for every vehicle.

name: cementry Galata
description: Drinking Water from a Spring with pressure.  near the entrance gate. very good to fill directly if you have some Meters of Water Pipe

name: Asparuhovo Beach
description:
A nice and calm camping spot near the Beach. There is a Parking Place for normal Campers. And also a more quiet place between the trees. 4x4 could be helpful. it is sandy.
200m near is a big Lidl Shop. at the beach are some nice Smalltalk Bars and Restaurants. 
The Beach is very clean.  drinking water spring is "missing"

name: MIK MONT AUTO - Parts for russian brands (UAZ, GAZ, LADA, KAMAZ ...)
description:
Nice and helpful small workshop of Krasimir Kirilov and his wife Nevena. She speaks very good English, so communication is not a problem. 
They organized a man who welded us a part of our UAZ Buhanca. And they helped us to change our oil sensor and find a new one.

Tel. +359 898 740024
Mail montavto1@abv.bg

name: torch Monument, lower parking
description:
200 meters from the Torch Monument.

here you can park with some shadow.
and more out of the wind.

good view on the Buzludzha monument.
and a view in the valley.

at night you see the Light of the guard house of the buzludza Monument.

in the morning the workers at the monument drive up in there trucks.

quit and peacefull, big change some other overlanders will be on one of the 3 spot's around the Monument.

name: Hotel Bulgaria
description: Located in the main avenue of the city, this hotel offers different options for their guests. I choose the cheapest, single room with normal size bed, TV, A/C, private bathroom. 55 Lev/night. In city you only have a cheeper option, hotel Hebros (50 Lev/night) but the quality is much lower. Breakfast is not included but you can have for 8Lev. Receptionist are very kind. Public swimming pool and park at 3 minutes walk (10Lev). I park my bike in their internal courtyard: is supervised by the dog and cameras. The owner is engaged in important solidarity projects for the vulnerable people of this city, including migrants. This is the reason why I would not hesitate to go back again!

name: Smart Hostel Sofia
description: Probably the most cheap place to sleep in the city center (8€/night in a 6 beds mixed dormitory). They give you only sheets and blankets. No soap, no towels. Voluntaries that managed the place are very friendly and welcoming. But everything is old and generally not very clean. You should pay few € more and sleep in another place.

name: Guarded Parking «Ropotamo»
description: Guarded Parking «Ropotamo» - very big, directly in front of the beach and of lot of beach restaurants on the pedestrian walk way in the new city of Sosopol. It is only 1 - 1.5 km far away from the old city of Sosopol. Pretty quiet in the night. The price is 15 BGN per night even for a big rig. Very nice and helpful people there.

name: Mountain meadow
description: Open clearing to mountain meadows with views all around. 200 meter from waterpoint.

name: Moto Magazin
description: Motorcycle parts store with all kinds of stuff. Run by no nonsense couple who are knowledgeable and patient despite language barrier. Prices good. Helped me get spark plugs and replacement caps.

name: Wild camping near the river
description: A wild place to camp, close to the river.  Accessible only by 4x4.  There will fit about 4 - 5 cars here. There are some mosquitoes in the evening.  Some firewood can be found in the area.

name: picknick area next to a spring
description: Really nice even ground. Parts are grassy and some paved. There is also a bench and a table with a roof to sit at. Locals come here to get water. It is drinkable. From 22-8 it was really quiet. But a lot of mosquitos (sadly, it is normal in this area)

name: Main square Debar
description: small fountain at the main square - built 2005. Good water and shady spot to have a break.

name: Toplata water
description: Popular public mineral water fountain - many locals come here as well with big containers.

name: Green Card Insurance Office
description: If you find yourself in Bulgaria without insurance like myself. There is only one office out of the dozens in town after crossing the border that will sell you a Green Card for foreign vehicles for all of EU countries. I paid 68 Lev /35  euro for 1 month. They also offered longer policies for marginally more.

name: Runya Lodge
description:
A cool family run guest house with 4x4 camper parking plus guest bedrooms.
Food available.

name: Valley view
description: Shaded place next to cross road. Only local traffic. Nice view over valley and hills.

name: Meadow view
description: Quiet and shaded place. Park on the meadow or under the trees.

name: Abandoned Place
description: Whatever this place has been, but now it is lost. Very nice view above all these structures and some nice bushes for getting a good shadow. Barely visible from the main road and here and there a car or a truck came along, but overall it was very quite here. Mobile connections has been OK (Orange)

name: Tasty water spring
description: Public source of tasty water, easy to stop car.

name: Cape Foros
description:
We didn't like the other place as it has been too crowded for us, but this one here was calm enough, even though cars passed by.
Nice view and halfway leveled here. Mobile connection was good (Orange)

name: Han Dyavolski Vodi
description: Nice hotel, nice Restaurant, the best spring water to be had anywhere. I sat next to the spring on the patio and refilled my glass often.  The food is excellent. The rooms are excellent. The service and prices are outstanding. The only regret I have of this place is the leaving of it. Every now and again I find a place that I regret leaving. This is such a place.

name: Arda beach
description: Down a single lane asphalt road off the main road, you will find a large pebble beach. Several flat spots. Beautiful place. There were a lot of cows roaming. Peaceful night. Beware the ground and pebbles are loose, we had trouble getting out.

name: Nice meadow
description: Just off the 4x4 road, but still feels private. Surrounded by trees. Nice rock fire ring. Unlimited firewood everywhere. Great place if you don’t want to stay in the hut. Flat ground for parking and tents. @lifeofshack

name: Near Kom hut
description: Lot of space under the trees near the mountain hut or near the pichnicktables. Some locals camp here also. Refreshing night in hot sumner, quiet

name: Near Sofia, Vitosa NP
description: Some picknickbenches next to the road and a river. Place for one car beside the tables, more places on the parking above. For us the best possibility near Sofia.

name: Abandoned Farmground
description: Next to the road near the fountain, just follow the dirt path. It is an old farmground, not very even, but one can manage to find a flat place. Some shadow from trees. Nothing special,  but the best we could find from our way from Melnik to the Pass.

name: Spring
description: Fountain with good pressure, locald fill up there. Good Water

name: camp close to the river
description: Flat area with some shadow, doable for all types of vehicles. Nice quiet spot used mainly by locals for fishing. We did not stay for the night, but there was one camper of locals and some tents.

name: Near Borino
description: Hidden pullout near the road, watertap across the street with good pressure, where locals fill there bottles and there is also a big shelter near the watertap.

name: Near Komuniga
description: Follow the dirt road from the main road for a few minutes down the valley. You will reach a flat meadow with shelter and a fountain with little water pressure. It is a quiet place, some locals pass.

name: Dzhinvira Winery
description:
Lovely little winery with excellent white, rose and red wines. George, son of the owner, led through the wine tasting in English language. Local appetizers like cheese, bread and sausage were provided. You can park and stay over night directly in front of the house, even with medium rigs like MB Sprinter, Vario or Iveco Daily. (For larger trucks please ask George where to park. They got more space in the wine yard.)
We truly recommend to stop here and “dive” into this lovely family winery business. 

https://www.dzhinvira-winery.bg/en/Contacts.html

name: Small tap at the park
description: Small constantly flowing tap at the park.

name: Arda Lake
description:
Follow the dirt road as shown in maps.me and you will reach a really big meadow at the lake. Lot of space, flat. Some locals may also stay here - but enough space to keep distance.
Some cows or sheep may pass.
Could be muddy after rain.

name: Propane Station
description: They refill gas bottles, many adapters available, could refill my german one here

name: On the cliffs
description: Big meadow above the cliffs, lot of space. Used by also by the locals.

name: Camping Eden Garden
description:
Camping Eden Garden is located in the picturesque Balkans, in the town of Sarnitsa, near the beautiful Dospat dam.  This exceptional location offers you the opportunity to enjoy a unique nature and relax in the surroundings of one of the most beautiful dams.

 The campsite offers you places for your campers, caravans and tents.  It has modern bathrooms and toilets (male and female), lawns for our guests, electricity, potable water, and return (dirty) water.  There are also quiet places to eat and drink, and for our youngest guests, there is a children's corner.

 We are waiting for you at Camping Eden Garden, where you will be able to discover peace, beauty, and magic in the enchanted nature of the Balkans.

name: Graveyard near Roman Villa
description: Watertap in the graveyard opposite the Roman Villa. Good Pressure. You can open the gate of the graveyard and drive to the watertap

name: Rousenski nationalpark border
description:
Small parking at the end of a dirt road, some hiking paths start here. Flat, tarmac, place for one or two cars, little river nearby. Directly under the rocks.
Not the best place, but good for one night before or after crossing the border.

name: Banderista camping
description: Free camping area behind the Banderista hut with mountains all around you.  Toilet nearby and a hearty but simple restaurant.  A good area for tents and space for campers but no electricity.

name: Bagira Campers
description: Very well stocked shop for camper equipment and accessories. We came with issues with our solar panel and the guys spent as much time as necessary to diagnose the issue. Unfortunately we couldn't find it by their closing time, but they even opened a new panel to troubleshoot the issue. Very nice guys.

name: Apartment Къща за гости "Карби"
description: Lovely apartment with pool and outside space. safe parking for motorbike and plenty of parking outside for rigs. Very nice owners. I paid 50lev.

name: Camping Strinava
description:
Great wee campsite on the side of  small river. Bulgarian run time warp camping, lovely and simple, out side sink, 2 showers and toilets, wifi near the reception building. Several small 70s style cabins, a few places for tents and some space for campervans. 7 lev for 1 person with tent and motorcycle. 
Super friendly but no English spoken. nice area for walking, swimming and there's a monastery just down the road.

name: St. Alexander Nevsky Cathedral
description:
Iconic Bulgarian Orthodox church with Neo-Byzantine architecture & an underground museum.
http://www.cathedral.bg/

name: Bela Extrem Bicycle Workshop
description:
Very good range of bicycle spare parts. Hoses, pedals, oils, rear derailleurs, brake systems, tools, clothing, bike sales
Border crossings to Greece and North Macedonia are nearby

name: Wild riverside camping
description: Clearing by the river off the dirt cycling track about 1.5 km east of Konina. Shaded forest by the river. Flat grassy spot on the car trail going towards the river

name: Dishonest supermarket
description: This supermarket sneakily increases the price of products when scanned at the checkout. take your calculator with you! as soon as I challenged them, they backed down and let me take my shopping for the correct price.

name: On the horseshoe island in Arda river
description: Beautiful spot in the inside of the horseshoe bend of the Arda river. Cross the bridge, pass the Vulture centre, keep left at the junction, after about 100 metres there is a dirt road that takes you all the way to the river. Marvellous views of the cliffs and the vultures. Very quiet.No facilities and internet signal weak.

name: Money Exchange
description: There is an exchange office in the large building by the roundabout.

name: Batak reservoir
description: Beautiful place with grassy ground and a beautiful view, very quiet right on the lake shore. No shadow. Good internet reception. 4x4 an advantage.

name: Water
description: Two fountains with cold drinking water. Good taste.

name: Water
description: Nice spring with cold water and the locals fill their drinking bottles.

name: Landrover mechanic
description: Landrover repair service in Sofia. The boss, named Cooper, speaks English, drives a Landrover Defender himself, knows also the older models well and can quickly organize spare parts.

name: Mineral water
description: Nice place with cold mineral water spring and the locals fill their drinking bottles.

name: Near Kalugarovo
description: Nice place, grassy ground and shade if you want a nice picnic spot. Very quiet. No 4x4 required as narrow paved road leads there. Internet reception a little.

name: Water with Picnic place
description: Nice spring with cold water and picnic place. The locals fill their drinking bottles.

name: Water
description: Big fountain with lots of cold good water in nowhere. 4x4 and ground clearance necessary.

name: Over the cliffs
description: Beautiful place above the rocky coast with a fantastic view. Flat and grassy ground. Quiet, clean but no shadow. Sometimes frequented by locals at the weekend. 4x4 not necessary - from the main road a gravel road. Internet very little.

name: Schabla beach
description: Nice place right on the beach. Grassy/sandy ground, quiet, no shadow. Lots of mushels and sea snails on the beach. Good internet reception. 4x4 not necessary. The next beach restaurant about 20-30 minutes walk. From Main Road 902 towards "Lunara Beach" and at the end turn right onto the dirt road.

name: Ivan guest house
description: Great little family business. Place for parking of your bike on the premises, secured. Friendly family and cheap place as well. 50 BNG per night. The city is beautiful as well - wife speaks English

name: Murgla, gravel Road to Trigrad
description: Flat gravel spot next to Tenes dere river. Take the river crossing about 2km behind Murgla. You can continue to Trigrad to visit the gorge and Devils  throat cave. Only 4x4 for river crossing.

name: By the lake
description: just off the road there's a gravel track of 1km that leads to a small lake. You can follow the track halfway around the lake. Multiple possibilities to camp. We saw some local people camping and fishing on the other side of the lake. Everything was very quiet and utterly beautiful.

name: Beach dune parking
description: Nice spot in front of (but no directly on) the beach in a parking place, no wind and very quiet in September

name: RideSide
description: Bike shop and service. They work every day and fix all kinds of bicycles, also electric bikes and electric scooters. The also sell bike parts

name: Camping Opletnja
description:
Cute little campsite, very basic amenities.
Fridge, drinking water, floor toilet and shower with warm water only when the sun is shining. There is a fireplace, BBQ and river pool.
Call the owner before arriving since he is not always there. (+359 89 769 9227 or +359 88 760 6168)
Payment is donation based.

Careful, the road into the side valley is very rough with some heavy bumps.

name: along the river
description:
amazing place for max 2 RV
In front of the river
No need 4x4 to go there
Continuing the path, other places available.
4G ok

name: Moto Boom
description: very nice shop , everything for ur bike ( oil , filter , brake pads … ) and good price ! and the owner very nice guy ! high recommended

name: Halfway stop on eco trail at top of the hill
description: Bus stop at bottom of hill. Head straight up and hike for about 45 mins to the top of the hill. Picnic bench and sea views of coast and Nessebar. Can return on same trail or turn left at picnic bench and then left again to another path downhill.  Route can be seen on Allltrails.

name: Hikers Hostel Plovdiv
description:
This is a very simple and old hostel. Don't expect any modern luxury. only have dorm beds. not a lot of privacy. But the price should reflect that. Paid 15 Lev walk-in price. Probably a bit more on booking.com

They have parking for a few motorcycles and are right in the center of old town. perfect location. I loved it there, manager Ivan is super nice and the guest there made me feel like I was home. For a budget traveller like me it was great.

name: Koprinka Lake
description: Down some tracks. Undisturbed. Lake view. Some occasional passers by - not disturbed in the night. Really good spot.
